divs: sighting detailshusband and i were driving home on a sunday morning from the sw corner of ok,(where we'd been on an overnight visit to see some family)we were going back to okc (we were heading due east)so were the ufo's)...was near lawton, near the deyo exit....they were flying to the left of us...saw them in our peripheral vision...flew quickly even with us, (we could see them our our van window)there were two shiny silver discs,(maybe side by side)or one just to the side and behind the other, looked like a mirror surface when it reflects the sunshine(they were some distance from us, over a large area of land which was unpopulated, except for a few ranches and\or farms...as they flew, i could see just a portion of them through the side window where my husband was sitting, then they left my vision, as they quickly angled upwards at a very high rate of speed....left yellow vapor trails, (with a black area (circle) from which the vapor was escaping) my husband was telling me, as i was asking him to describe them to me as they ascended...(they were then out of my line of vision (we were still driving down the highway), as they quickly went out of sight....i truly was puzzled at the sight, i thought maybe it was some new kind of artillery which was being fired at a nearby army base...(not stopping to think had it been that, i would've never been able to see it....) we told our grown children, who think we've 'lost it'......so we don't tell this to many people...i've never believed in ufo's until it happened to us.....(anonymous please) but it did happen !!!
Summary: saw two silver discs flying parallel to the HW then curved sharply upwards at a high rate of speed left a yellow vapor trail, silver-glass-like, huge discs
